Source code for fabriccloud.provider.digitalocean

__author__ = 'stonerri'

from fabric.contrib.project import rsync_project
from fabric.api import *


[docs]def setDefaults():
    ''' Configures fabric to use DO user and hostname

    :return:
    '''

    env.user = 'root'

    # set your digital ocean hostname here (hardcoded for convenience)
    env.hosts = ['192.241.156.224']



[docs]def systemInformation():

    pass




[docs]def sync():

    exclude_list = [
        '.git',
        '.vagrant',
        '.idea',
        '.DS_Store',
        'manage/.git/',
        'manage/.vagrant/',
        'manage/.idea/',
        '_build',
        '_sources',
        '_templates',
        'manage/.DS_Store',
        'server/apps/annotator/venv'
    ]

    rsync_project('/vagrant', local_dir='../', exclude=exclude_list)
